title: LCM Sum
text:
Given n, calculate the sum LCM(1, n) + LCM(2, n) + .. + LCM(n, n), where LCM(i, n) denotes the Least Common Multiple of the integers i and n.InputThe first line contains T the number of test cases. 
Each of the next T lines contain an integer n.OutputOutput T lines, one for each test case, containing the required sum.ExampleInput:3
1
2
5Output:1
4
55Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 3000001 ≤ n ≤ 1000000
